alert.note: Alert for Edgecombe; Halifax (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 2:02PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Edgecombe and central Halifax Counties through 230 PM EDT... At 202 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Scotland Neck, or 14 miles south of Rich Square, moving northwest at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Roanoke Rapids, Halifax, Scotland Neck, Weldon, Hobgood, South Weldon, Rosemary, Tillery and Roanoke Rapids Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
